channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Stoke-on-Trent to design a safe and practical garden for Doris and her daughter Petra, inspired by the German meadows that surrounded Doris's childhood home.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and his team head to Derbyshire to build an exciting garden for sprightly D-Day Veteran Jack Parrott and his wife of 68 years Margaret.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: Alan and Val put their savings on the line for a high-tech boat to help them spend time with their family. But first they need to learn how to live on the water.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Musketeer
channel.desc: Kevin McNally stars as Porthos, one of the Three Musketeers, in this award-winning short drama.
